Great overview of neighborhoods

Aug 2025 • Couples
In a short time, we were able to cover some very nice spots in lemon neighborhoods that we would have never seen otherwise. The guide, Sandy, was very interesting, and made the tour fun.
Written August 24, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Lima Highlights Tours
Dear customer,

reviews.title: Great overview of neighborhoods
reviews.text: In a short time, we were able to cover some very nice spots in lemon neighborhoods that we would have never seen otherwise. The guide, Sandy, was very interesting, and made the tour fun.

reviews.title: A mandatory in Lima
reviews.text: A super interesting tour. A super comfortable way to see all the neighborhoods of Lima that you have to see, they take you with the private van in a super small group and explain all the beautiful places in the area. Sandy is super nice and makes the tour super enjoyable and interesting. It also helps a lot with tips for your stay in Peru. I recommend 100%.

reviews.title: Highly recommended tour in Lima!
reviews.text: I use a lot of tours with a guide all over the world. Alexandra is the best tour guide I have ever had. She is very friendly, kind and has excellent conversation skills. Her attention to details is impeccable. She is the only tour guide with whom I honestly retained all the information that she shared. I wish I had more trips with her is Peru. Jimmy - our driver was very good and a safe driver. The tour itinerary is good.  We were not rushed, had ample time to see places and have questions. It was small group of 5 which was amazing!

reviews.title: Good times in Lima
reviews.text: Susan and Sandy were very considerate and knowledgeable. Both gave us a very good background history of this beautiful country. Thanks for an enjoyable and informative day

reviews.title: Wonderful introduction to Lima and Peru.
reviews.text: Lima Highlights Tours provided an exceptional full day tour of Lima. We were short on time and this tour hit the main areas to see. Our guide, Martin, was professional and very knowledgeable about Lima and Peru. A great way to get introduced to Lima and Peru. A van picked us up and dropped us off at your hotel, which was nice as Lima's traffic is hectic.

reviews.title: Excellent tour
reviews.text: The tour was truly enjoyable and very well organized. Jonathan was extremely professional and competent, while Susan was kind, empathetic, and incredibly well-prepared. They really did everything they could for us, also speaking more than one language. I'm quite sure that not much more could have been done in a single day.

reviews.title: Highly recommended tour in 3 main districts of Lima
reviews.text: Highly recommended tour in 3 main districts of Lima along with our guide, Martin. Very knowledgeable in Peruvian infos and culture.

reviews.title: Great afternoon seeing highlights of these Lima Districts - Enjoyable and informative tour with excellent guide.
reviews.text: A great way to spend s few hours getting to know these 3 districts. The Barranco walk with the guides knowledgeable input was excellent.

reviews.title: Great Day on the Lima Highlights Tour!
reviews.text: I had a great morning on the Lima Highlights Tour led by Jonathan.  He was very knowledgeable and friendly, and I learned a lot about Lima.  The van arrived exactly on time to pick me up and the driver was very safe.  I would definitely book with this company again!

reviews.title: 1st time to Lima
reviews.text: After watching some videos online I decided it was best to book a tour of these neighborhoods to get a feel for the area.  Jonathan was very informative and answered all our questions.  It’s well worth doing and just long enough so the tour never dragged on.Highly recommend  so much so we booked the historical tour with Lima Highlights
